# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version  | Supported          |
| -------- | ------------------ |
| 0.12.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 0.12.0 | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

To report a vulnerability, please email [pkg@johannschopplich.com](mailto:pkg@johannschopplich.com) and include the word "SECURITY" in the subject line.
